source.table: (SELECT top 10 LOWER([udi].[udi_uuid]) AS entityId, LOWER([udi].[udi_uuid]) AS entityUuid, CONVERT(DATETIME2, [udi].[udi_updated_date] AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AS entityUpdateDate, CAST ([udi].[udi_dch_id] AS VARCHAR(10))  AS distributionChannelEntityId, 'home_away:'+CAST ([udi].[udi_uni_id] AS VARCHAR(10))  AS unitEntityId, GETDATE() AS lastPullDate, [udi].[udi_id],[udi].[udi_uni_id], [udi].[udi_dis_id],[udi].[udi_dch_id],[udi].[udi_distribute] FROM [dbo].[unit_distribution] AS udi  WHERE 1 = 1) A

sql.query: select entityId  as _id, unitEntityId, distributionChannelEntityId, CAST(udi_id AS STRING)  as unitDistributionId, CAST(udi_uni_id AS STRING) as udiUnitId,CAST(udi_dis_id AS STRING) as distributionId,CAST(udi_dch_id AS STRING) as udiDchId,  CAST(udi_distribute as BOOLEAN) as udiDistribute,entityUuid, entityUpdateDate, CAST('0000' AS STRING) as systemCode, lastPullDate from unit_distribution
